text: Hof () is a rural district in Upper Franconia in north Bavaria, Germany. However the district does not include the city of Hof, which is an urban district itself. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Helmbrechts #Lichtenberg #Münchberg #Naila #Rehau #Schauenstein #Schwarzenbach am Wald #Schwarzenbach an der Saale #Selbitz #Bad Steben #Berg #Döhlau #Feilitzsch #Gattendorf #Geroldsgrün #Issigau #Köditz #Konradsreuth 10. Leupoldsgrün 11. Oberkotzau 12. Regnitzlosau 13. Sparneck 14. Stammbach 15. Töpen 16. Trogen 17. Weißdorf 18.
